body.p: The following functions, which are provided by ebuild.sh, can be used to query variables and similar state.

tr.ti: Returns a true value if and only if flagname is included in USE
As use, guaranteed to produce no output.
As use, echoes flagname upon success.
Echoes either --enable-str or --disable-str depending upon useq flag. If str is not specified, uses flag instead.
Returns true if flag is included in the flag list string (example: if has ccache $FEATURES ; then).
As has, echoes flag on success.
Echoes the 'best' version of pkg which is currently installed.
True if pkg (can include version specifiers) is installed.
